title: Population in Sweden 2018 , by level of education
summary: This statistic presents the 2018 of users in the Population in 2018 , sorted by Upper_secondary_education_(less_than_3_years) .

During the survey period , it was found that 19.5 % of the population had a Upper_secondary_education_(less_than_3_years) Primary_and_lower_education_(less_than_9_years) of Upper_secondary_education_(less_than_3_years) at Sweden .

Furthermore , 23.4 % of population also hat a Upper_secondary_education_(3_years_or_more) plan and 14.5 % Lower_secondary_education_(9_years) subscribed to Upper_secondary_education_(3_years_or_more) online service Primary_and_lower_education_(less_than_9_years) Post-secondary_education_(less_than_3_years) type of Primary_and_lower_education_(less_than_9_years) .

data.Level Of Education: Primary and lower education (less than 9 years)

gold: The number of Swedes with higher education , a post-secondary education of three years or more , increased since 2000 , while the number without decreased . In 2017 , around 37 percent of the population had at least some level of post-secondary education . Among them , 21.7 percent had an upper secondary education of three years or more .
